



# Begode MASTER PRO V2
**RELEASE YEAR :**  2022

## Specifications


|Wheel diameter       | 18 inches                     |
| :---: | :---: |
|Dimensions           | 457 x 530 x 178 mm (L x W x H)|
|Controller position  | side                          |
|Tire dimension       | 18 inches, 4.1 inches wide    |
|RGB                  | Yes                           |
|Water rating         | IP 54                         |
|Max. Load            | 150 kg                        |
|Net weight           | 24 kg                         |
|Range                | 90 km                         |
|Max speed            | 45 km/h                       |
|Motor power          | 1800 W                        |
|Battery              | 995 Wh                        |
|Tension              | 58.8 V                        |
|Battery architecture | 14s6p                         |
|Cells                | LG MH1 (18650) li-ion         |
